title: Voxxia, the noise of noxus.
body:
VOXXIA
Role - marksman secondary – mage

look- thin, twisted woman humanoid with a black leather get up with a mask and ear muffs, carrying a thrumpet-esque cannon called a vox shooter.

Passive- POW!- voxxia’s skillshot abilities(q,e) knockback enemies(150 range) if they are traveling towards her, and knockback allies(300 range) if they are moving away from her.

q- distortion - lets out a wave of distorted noise in a cone shape dealing dam +  ap damage.6 seconds cd

w-sonic boom – after casting for .5 seconds voxxia places a vox speaker on the ground sending out 3 shock waves that knocks enemy champions back, allied champions can pass through instantly and come out on the other side(maybe?).20 seconds cd

E –nasty note – sends out a shot of concentrated noise in a line that deals damage and ap+ad dam and slows for 1.25 secs. 5 seconds cd

R-. – deafening blast. Voxxia aims her gun toward the sky, and shoots out a thundering boom sending out an aggressive soundwave. Dealing damage and causing confusion(same effect as fear) for 2/2.5/3 s withing range( decent range).

replies.body:
Voxxia, the chamber maid

- the troll champ
because every other champion cant be? lol
